PAD_AbsoluteHuntsBox.synopsis: The party reflects on learning that they are being hunted by the followers of the Absolute for the 'weapon' they have - in fact the strange artefact that protected them from the mysterious Voice when they first reached the temple.This can occur after meeting with Dror Ragzlin or Minthara.
PAD_AbsoluteHuntsBox.how_to_trigger: WLD_Main_A,Talk to either Minthara or Dror Ragzlin.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: There is only one session provided: 'PAD_AbsoluteHuntsBox'. Its synopsis indicates that it occurs after meeting either Dror Ragzlin or Minthara, but since neither of these sessions is included in the input, we cannot assert a concrete ordering among the provided sessions. Similarly, there is no data suggesting any mutual exclusiveness with another session.

PAD_AbsoluteHuntsBox_0.speaker: Player
PAD_AbsoluteHuntsBox_0.text: They're seeking a weapon. I wonder if they mean that odd artefact...

PAD_AbsoluteHuntsBox_1.speaker: Player
PAD_AbsoluteHuntsBox_1.text: They're seeking a weapon. I wonder if they mean that odd artefact...

PAD_AbsoluteHuntsBox_2.speaker: Player
PAD_AbsoluteHuntsBox_2.text: If that's the case, we've got more problems than just the worms in our heads.
